Question: As of 2012, this person is Hollywood's highest-paid actor.
Hints: This person is an outspoken advocate for the Church of Scientology.
In 2007, this person took a rare supporting role for the second time in Lions for Lambs, which was a commercial disappointment.
The following year this person starred in the romantic thriller Vanilla Sky (2001) with Cameron Diaz and Penélope Cruz.
